creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: abstracted image of woman's head with eyes and nose delineated; white arcs separating colored planes--browns, grey, mottled greens, khaki, orange and brown; shin hanga (fūkei-ga)
marks: Signature, Title, Date and Seal LLC in bottom margin, in pencil: [Woman in Bagdad]
title: Woman in Bagdad
